Kirill P. Elizarov is an internationally known Public Relations Expert from Russia. He is recognized as a remarkable businessman in the field of international public relations and mass media that helps organizations and governments and its publics adapt mutually to each other.

THE WINNER 2010 OF THE AWARD OF PUBLIC RELATIONS SOCIETY OF RUSSIA

As a distinguished PR businessman during his 21-year-career, Mr. Elizarov has been working not only throughout former U.S.S.R., but also in China, Israel, France, Finland, Monaco, and South Korea, as well as having been recognized by prominent business people, government officials, and renowned business organizations around the world. As an internationally recognized businessman Mr. Elizarov has traveled extensively throughout the world to work on various PR and mass media projects.
